channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Visiting a New University in Austin, Texas
item.description: Places like the University of Austin, driven by the Great Books, merit, and free inquiry, are part of the mix in changing higher ed’s tune.

item.title: There’s Too Much of Everything
item.description: The deluge of entertainment and information in our era is diluting our enjoyment.

item.title: The Attacks on ICE Must Stop
item.description: The latest attack on an agency facility in Dallas is not an isolated incident.
